remarks: The metric of the extended real number structure is only real when both arguments are real.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
statement:
xrsds.d $e |- D = ( dist ` RR*s ) $.
xrsdsreclb $p |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ A =/= B ) -> ( ( A D B ) e. RR <-> ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) ) ) $.
